definitions.definition: The person or organization to which something, such as a letter or message, is addressed or sent , for whom the item is intended.
A person or entity to whom discourse is directed, or the words referring to such an entity.

main_definition: The person or organization to which something, such as a letter or message, is addressed or sent , for whom the item is intended.
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A person or entity to whom discourse is directed, or the words referring to such an entity.
